MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5.10PM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.49PM on 30th March 2021.
